issue.title: [CF 1504] "Secondary Resource"
issue.body:
When creating a resource display TMW offers a primary resource options that is a merge of mana, energy, pain ... displays.

Please, consider adding some sort of secondary display to show combo points, holy power, arcane charges ... in a single display.


> Posted by CurseForge user mjsmagalhaes | Imported from CurseForge issue #1504 | Raw
